meta:attr.name: type
meta:attr.description: Type of the measured device.

meta:attr.name: id
meta:attr.description: Unique id of the measured device.

meta:attr.name: analysisDate
meta:attr.description: The date and time this analysis was performed.

meta:attr.name: name
meta:attr.description: The name of the adaptor used.

meta:attr.name: socket
meta:attr.description: The adaptor's connector this device is plugged into.

meta:attr.name: correctionCoefficient
meta:attr.description: Ratio of the threshold measured with the device in this socket of the adaptor to that measured with the same device in a reference scoket.

meta:attr.name: pulseDivisionFactor
meta:attr.description: Pulse division factor.

meta:attr.name: injectionCapacitance
meta:attr.description: Injection capacitance.

meta:attr.name: index
meta:attr.description: Index of this measurement.

meta:attr.name: type
meta:attr.description: Threshold scan (efficiency vs. pulse amplitude).

meta:attr.name: type
meta:attr.description: Time vs. pulse amplitude.

meta:attr.name: capacitor
meta:attr.description: Pulses were injected through the external capacitor.

meta:attr.name: capacitor
meta:attr.description: Pulses were injected through the device's internal capacitor.

meta:attr.name: nPulses
meta:attr.description: Number of pulses at each amplitude.

meta:attr.name: setThreshold
meta:attr.description: Device's discriminator threshold value set in ADC units.

meta:attr.name: setThresholdVoltage
meta:attr.description: Device's discriminator threshold value set in mV.

meta:attr.name: number
meta:attr.description: Channel number.

meta:attr.name: threshold
meta:attr.description: The measured threshold in units of fC.

meta:attr.name: noise
meta:attr.description: The measured noise in units of fC.

meta:attr.name: chi2ndf
meta:attr.description: Chi square over number of degrees of freedom of the threshold curve fit.

meta:attr.name: mean
meta:attr.description: Mean time in ns.

meta:attr.name: RMS
meta:attr.description: Time RMS in ns.

meta:attr.name: spanOfMeans
meta:attr.description: The maximum over the input charge range of the difference of the mean time responses.

meta:attr.name: spanOfRMSs
meta:attr.description: The maximum over the input charge range of the difference of the RMS of time responses.

meta:attr.name: offset
meta:attr.description: Offset, i.e., the intercept of the straight line fitted to the setThreshold( measuredThresold ) function.

meta:attr.name: gain
meta:attr.description: Gain, i.e., the slope of the straight line fitted to the setThreshold( measuredThresold ) function.

meta:attr.name: C_int
meta:attr.description: Internal capacitance.

meta:attr.name: averageNoise
meta:attr.description: Average over the external capacitor threshold scan measurements of the noise.

meta:attr.name: max
meta:attr.description: Maximum over the channels of the mean times.

meta:attr.name: min
meta:attr.description: Minimum over the channels of the mean times.

meta:attr.name: mean
meta:attr.description: Average over the channels of the mean times.

meta:attr.name: rms
meta:attr.description: RMS over the channels of the mean times.

meta:attr.name: maxAbsResid
meta:attr.description: Maximum absolute residual over the channels of the mean times.

meta:attr.name: max
meta:attr.description: Maximum over the channels of the RMS values of times.

meta:attr.name: min
meta:attr.description: Minimum over the channels of the RMS values of times.

meta:attr.name: mean
meta:attr.description: Average over the channels of the RMS values of times.

meta:attr.name: rms
meta:attr.description: RMS over the channels of the RMS values of times.

meta:attr.name: maxAbsResid
meta:attr.description: Maximum absolute residual over the channels of the RMS values of times.

meta:attr.name: nominalInputCharge
meta:attr.description: The nominal input charge value at which to quote the time responses.

meta:attr.name: realInputCharge
meta:attr.description: The real input charge value at which to quote the time responses. This can be slightly different from the nominal value due to the finite amplitude steps.

meta:attr.name: fromInputCharge
meta:attr.description: The start of the input charge range over which the time resolution and slew are calculated.

meta:attr.name: toInputCharge
meta:attr.description: The end of the input charge range over which the time resolution and slew are calculated.

meta:attr.name: max
meta:attr.description: Maximum over the channels of the maximum differences of mean times.

meta:attr.name: min
meta:attr.description: Minimum over the channels of the maximum differences of mean times.

meta:attr.name: mean
meta:attr.description: Average over the channels of the maximum differences of mean times.

meta:attr.name: rms
meta:attr.description: RMS over the channels of the maximum differences of mean times.

meta:attr.name: maxAbsResid
meta:attr.description: Maximum absolute residual over the channels of the maximum differences of mean times.

meta:attr.name: max
meta:attr.description: Maximum over the channels of the maximum differences of RMSs of times.

meta:attr.name: min
meta:attr.description: Minimum over the channels of the maximum differences of RMSs of times.

meta:attr.name: mean
meta:attr.description: Average over the channels of the maximum differences of RMSs of times.

meta:attr.name: rms
meta:attr.description: RMS over the channels of the maximum differences of RMSs of times.

meta:attr.name: maxAbsResid
meta:attr.description: Maximum absolute residual over the channels of the maximum differences of RMSs of times.

meta:attr.name: max
meta:attr.description: Maximum over the channels of the measured noise values.

meta:attr.name: min
meta:attr.description: Minimum over the channels of the measured noise values.

meta:attr.name: mean
meta:attr.description: Average over the channels of the measured noise values.

meta:attr.name: rms
meta:attr.description: RMS over the channels of the measured noise values.

meta:attr.name: maxAbsResid
meta:attr.description: Maximum absolute residual over the channels of the measured noise values.

meta:attr.name: max
meta:attr.description: Maximum over the channels of the measured gain values.

meta:attr.name: min
meta:attr.description: Minimum over the channels of the measured gain values.

meta:attr.name: mean
meta:attr.description: Average over the channels of the measured gain values.

meta:attr.name: rms
meta:attr.description: RMS over the channels of the measured gain values.

meta:attr.name: maxAbsResid
meta:attr.description: Maximum absolute residual over the channels of the measured gain values.

meta:attr.name: max
meta:attr.description: Maximum over the channels of the measured offset values.

meta:attr.name: min
meta:attr.description: Minimum over the channels of the measured offset values.

meta:attr.name: mean
meta:attr.description: Average over the channels of the measured offset values.

meta:attr.name: rms
meta:attr.description: RMS over the channels of the measured offset values.

meta:attr.name: maxAbsResid
meta:attr.description: Maximum absolute residual over the channels of the measured offset values.

meta:attr.name: max
meta:attr.description: Maximum over the channels of the measured internal capacitance values.

meta:attr.name: min
meta:attr.description: Minimum over the channels of the measured internal capacitance values.

meta:attr.name: mean
meta:attr.description: Average over the channels of the measured internal capacitance values.

meta:attr.name: rms
meta:attr.description: RMS over the channels of the measured internal capacitance values.

meta:attr.name: maxAbsResid
meta:attr.description: Maximum absolute residual over the channels of the measured internal capacitance values.

meta:attr.name: value
meta:attr.description: Average set threshold calculated from the avarage gain and offset for the specified input charge.

meta:attr.name: atCharge
meta:attr.description: Input charge for which the average set threshold is calculated from the avarage gain and offset.

meta:attr.name: value
meta:attr.description: Maximum over the channels of the measured threshold values for which the set threshold is the specified value.

meta:attr.name: atSetThreshold
meta:attr.description: Set threshold value for which the maximum over the channels of the measured threshold values is calculated.
